description.zh-cn: 四川省已撤消的专区，1950年设立，1968年改置为绵阳地区。其专员公署曾驻于绵阳县。
description.en: A defunct special district in Sichuan Province, established in 1950 and reorganized into Mianyang Prefecture in 1968. Its commissioner's office was located in Mianyang County.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区。绵阳专区自1952年起由其管辖。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region of the People's Republic of China. Mianyang Special District was under its jurisdiction since 1952.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的省级行政单位，绵阳专区设立初期隶属于此。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative unit in the early days of the People's Republic of China, to which Mianyang Special District was initially subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 原四川省县份，是绵阳专区专员公署的驻地，为现今绵阳市的前身。
description.en: A former county in Sichuan Province, it was the seat of the Mianyang Special District Commissioner's Office and the predecessor of today's Mianyang City.

description.zh-cn: 原四川省县份，1958年并入江油县。
description.en: A former county in Sichuan Province, merged into Jiangyou County in 1958.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，曾隶属于绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, formerly under the jurisdiction of Mianyang Special District.

description.zh-cn: 原四川省县份，1959年被撤销。
description.en: A former county in Sichuan Province, abolished in 1959.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，曾隶属于绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, formerly under the jurisdiction of Mianyang Special District.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，曾隶属于绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, formerly under the jurisdiction of Mianyang Special District.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，曾隶属于绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, formerly under the jurisdiction of Mianyang Special District.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，曾隶属于绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, formerly under the jurisdiction of Mianyang Special District.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，曾隶属于绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, formerly under the jurisdiction of Mianyang Special District.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，曾隶属于绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, formerly under the jurisdiction of Mianyang Special District.

description.zh-cn: 四川省地级市，由原绵阳县发展而来。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Sichuan Province, developed from the former Mianyang County.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1953年划入绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1953年划入绵阳专区。1958年与彰明县合并，曾短暂命名为江彰县。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1953. In 1958, it merged with Zhangming County and was briefly named Jiangzhang County.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1953年划入绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1953年划入绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1953年划入绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1953年划入绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1953年划入绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 原四川省县份，1953年划入绵阳专区，1959年被撤销。
description.en: A former county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1953 and abolished in 1959.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1958年划入绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1958.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1958年划入绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1958.

description.zh-cn: 原四川省县份，1958年划入绵阳专区，现隶属于重庆市。
description.en: A former county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1958, now under the jurisdiction of Chongqing Municipality.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市，原潼南县现今隶属于此。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China, to which the former Tongnan County now belongs.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1958年划入绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1958.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1958年划入绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1958.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1958年划入绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1958.

description.zh-cn: 四川省县份，1958年划入绵阳专区。
description.en: A county in Sichuan Province, incorporated into Mianyang Special District in 1958.

description.zh-cn: 1968年由绵阳专区改置的行政区。
description.en: An administrative region reorganized from Mianyang Special District in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 1950年绵阳专区设立时，原属川西行署区。
description.en: When Mianyang Special District was established in 1950, it was originally subordinate to the Western Sichuan Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 1952年，绵阳专区恢复由四川省管辖。
description.en: In 1952, Mianyang Special District was returned to the jurisdiction of Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本“今属重庆”，潼南县现今隶属于重庆市。
description.en: According to the text 'now belongs to Chongqing', Tongnan County is currently under the jurisdiction of Chongqing Municipality.

description.zh-cn: 1958年，彰明县与江油县合并。
description.en: In 1958, Zhangming County was merged with Jiangyou County.

description.zh-cn: 1959年，昭化县被撤销。
description.en: In 1959, Zhaohua County was abolished.

description.zh-cn: 1959年，罗江县被撤销。
description.en: In 1959, Luojiang County was abolished.

description.zh-cn: 1968年，绵阳专区改置为绵阳地区。
description.en: In 1968, Mianyang Special District was reorganized into Mianyang Prefecture.
